title: Gender Dependent Structures in Charachter Networks

yaml.author: Termeh Shafie
yaml.title: Gender Dependent Structures in Charachter Networks
yaml.description: Using network analysis to analyze gender representation in popular cinema.

markdown.markdown: Since 2019, I'm sporadically working on a project with [Pete Jones](https://www.petejon.es/) which aims to apply existing and novel quantitative methods (e.g. relational event models, entropy based natural language processing and multigraph representations), to study the gendered inequalities in popular cinema. See Pete's website for more information and some awesome packages such as [charinet](https://github.com/pj398/charinet) which he has developed on the topic.

metadata.author: Termeh Shafie
metadata.title: Gender Dependent Structures in Charachter Networks
metadata.description: Using network analysis to analyze gender representation in popular cinema.
